root.name: MunchMobile
root.description: MunchMobile is a driving game for the Texas Instruments 99/4A console. The player controls a small, red car with the main objective being to avoid environmental hazards and grab food. Food allows the car to replenish its fuel and continue driving. If the player does not successfully grab fuel than eventually the car will stop and the player will fail the level. MunchMobile manualMunchMobile screenshotMunchMobile screenshot
